constituent: shallow, water, water droplets, water pistol, float, fiesta
heisigStory: An entourage of floats going from one town to the next must always seek a shallow place to cross the water. Try to picture what happens if they don't.
koohiiStory1: The water can´t be too SHALLOW if you expect to float.
koohiiStory2: The water isn´t shallow enough to ford (#372). We´ll have to cross by float!
myStory: nông. nước thấp. ko sâu. nước chưa qua hàng rào có 3 mốc.
words: wretched, miserable, shameful, mean, despicable, abject
